teaser: Singer-songwriter Todd Snider (who told us a particularly classic story) kicks the night off with a joke. He’s on tour now, but we started the show with that joke because in addition to making us laugh, it is about food. Clever, we know.
title: A Taste(ful) Folk Joke
description: Singer-songwriter Todd Snider (who told us a particularly classic story) kicks the night off with a joke. He’s on tour now, but we started the show with that joke because in addition to making us laugh, it is about food. Clever, we know.

contentencoded: Singer-songwriter Todd Snider (who told us a particularly classic story) kicks the night off with a joke. He’s on tour now, but we started the show with that joke because in addition to making us laugh, it is about food. Clever, we know.
